pullrequest.title: Fix actor animation loading and rendering issues

content.raw: This also causes a non crashing error message ("Unable to find value for key[allow_auto_disable]"). If we set this based on the existence of the element "allow_auto_disable", not sure whether we need to initialize it here to a default value or in inherited classes of Link base class.
content.html: This also causes a non crashing error message ("Unable to find value for key[allow_auto_disable]"). If we set this based on the existence of the element "allow_auto_disable", not sure whether we need to initialize it here to a default value or in inherited classes of Link base class.
